articles.title: Rohit Sharma Opens Up On Cheteshwar Pujara And Ajinkya Rahane's Future In Test Cricket - NDTV Sports
articles.description: India and Sri Lanka will lock horns in a two-match Test series, beginning Friday in Mohali. Rahane and Pujara have been dropped for the Tests and it will be interesting to see who comes into the side.
